page.title: 03MINERAL EXTRACTION AYLESFORD
page.content: Over the last 100 yrs minerals have been extracted for industry.Between Aylesford and Eccles sand and gravel are worked.Aylesford Sand Co have 300 acres in our block.Half of the area known as the "Southern Pits" has been dug.Much of this has become filled with water because of working below the water table.Some of the banks around the lake have very steep sides, the water is very deep and dangerous. There are approximately 40acres of water.The sand is used in building ,road construction and glass making. Sand is processed at Rochester Road sand pit and taken all over SE England.When they have taken out all the sand the company will turn the area,including the lakes in to a sports ground with special facilities for water sports.
